The files in this folder are used to generate the dictionary text assets for the VKB's prediction
system. The steps to use this are located below.

1. Install node.js

2. Pull down the Gaia GitHub repository located at the link below:
â€ŒLink: https://github.com/mozilla-b2g/gaia

3. Navigate to the apps/keyboard/js/imes/latin/dictionaries folder and follow the steps at the link
below to generate the dictionary file:
https://github.com/mozilla-b2g/gaia/tree/master/apps/keyboard/js/imes/latin/dictionaries

4. Save file as a .txt file and store it in the RunTime/Plugins/ThirdParty/Dictionaries folder.

For more information, please read the wiki pages linked below:
https://wiki.mozilla.org/Gaia/System/Keyboard/IME/Latin/Prediction_%26_Auto_Correction
https://wiki.mozilla.org/Gaia/System/Keyboard/IME/Latin/Dictionary_Blob
